mapper.select: SELECT ff.*, m.m_name FROM(SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rowNum, bb.* , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE bdel=1) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT b.bno, b.btitle, b.bdate, b.blike, b.bdel, b.m_no FROM board b) bb, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R WHERE bdel=1 ORDER BY bb.bno ) as ff join members m on ff.m_no = m.m_no order by bno desc LIMIT 0, 10
SELECT bcontent, buuid, bip FROM boardview WHERE bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board (btitle, bcontent, m_no, bip, buuid) values (#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, (select m_no from members where m_id = #{m_id}), #{bip}, #{buuid})
mapper.update: update board set blike = blike + 1 where bno = #{bno}
